last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: After proposing to Min, Se-yeon copes with the consequences of his sacrifice and reveals the truth to her parents; Seo Ji-uk's trial begins.

name: Abyss
overview: After meeting an untimely demise in separate incidents, Cha Min and Go Se-yeon discover they’ve come back to life in new bodies they don’t recognize.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After meeting an untimely demise in separate incidents, Cha Min and Go Se-yeon discover they've come back to life in new bodies they don't recognize.

tagline: The goddess was reborn as a woman, and an ugly man was reborn as a super handsome man.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After getting alarming news from his fiancee, Cha Min has a mishap and receives an object called Abyss; Go Se-yeon meets someone who says that he is a friend.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Min explains what he did to Se-yeon, who is in disbelief over her circumstances; vowing to find her killer, she comes up with a way to help Min and herself.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Se-yeon and Min are stunned by what Park Gi-man has been doing, and they unwittingly get help from a police detective who thinks that she is someone else.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Convinced that he has seen his ex-fiancee, Min is frantic to talk to her, but Se-yeon tries to remind him that he is not the same person anymore.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After making a horrific discovery, Se-yeon considers using Abyss and tries to persuade Park Dong-cheol to keep investigating the murder of the prosecutor.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Park Dong-cheol tries to hunt down Oh Yeong-cheol, who keeps eluding the police; Min's mother doesn't know what to make of the changes she sees in her son.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Se-yeon finds herself viewing Min in a different light after realizing he has always been by her side; Jang Hui-jin reveals something surprising to Min.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Park Dong-cheol demands to know why Se-yeon interferes with the case; someone claiming to be Lee Mi-do appears out of nowhere.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Se-yeon tries to explain her actions to Min and has an emotional reunion with her mother; Hui-jin refuses to back down upon being confronted by Min's mother.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Se-yeon gets a feeling that she may be in danger, Min reveals a secret about his father, and Hui-jin's mother becomes agitated after seeing someone on the television.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: After Park Dong-cheol alerts him about Oh Yeong-cheol, Min goes looking for Se-yeon. Lee Mi-do's parents get a perplexing proposal from Min's mother.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Se-yeon senses something unnerving about Seo Ji-uk; Hui-jin gets an unexpected visitor and has an idea about what Oh Yeong-cheol could be planning to do.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: While attempting to help Park Gi-man with a case, Se-yeon and Min discover something strange; Seo Ji-uk gets a visitor.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Seo Ji-uk puts his plan in motion. On the way to meet Se-yeon, Min receives a disturbing call from Park Dong-cheol and struggles with a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Min and Se-yeon set out to acquire evidence against Seo Ji-uk, with Park Dong-cheol's help; Min's mother questions Se-yeon about her intentions.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: After proposing to Min, Se-yeon copes with the consequences of his sacrifice and reveals the truth to her parents; Seo Ji-uk's trial begins.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After meeting an untimely demise in separate incidents, Cha Min and Go Se-yeon discover they've come back to life in new bodies they don't recognize.
